title: U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( romaine and leaf ) 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Per capita consumption in pounds. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 15.0 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 8.0 was reported at Year 2001
